this_title: The Black Crowes: Freak 'N' Roll... Into the Fog
introduction: Shot live at the famous Fillmore in San Francisco in August 2005, this is The Black Crowes caught at their very best. After taking a break to pursue solo ventures in 2002 their 2005 tour became one of the hottest tickets of the US summer. With a set featuring all their greatest hits and some stunning acoustic versions in the middle of a two and a half hour show performed by one of the greatest live bands of all time, this is a concert simply not to be missed.
chinese_title: The Black Crowes: Freak 'N' Roll... Into the Fog
